price: A lõkacin da Ubangijinka Yake yin wahayi zuwa ga Malã'iku cẽwa: "Lalle ne Ni, Inã tãre da ku, sai ku tabbatar da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni: Zã Ni jẽfa tsõro a cikin zukãtan waɗanda suka kãfirta, sai ku yi dũka bisa ga wuyõyi kuma ku yi dũka daga gare su ga dukkan yãtsu.*
arabic: إِذۡ يُوحِي رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ أَنِّي مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْۚ سَأُلۡقِي فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱلرُّعۡبَ فَٱضۡرِبُواْ فَوۡقَ ٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَٱضۡرِبُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَنَانٖ
footnotes: * Sa'an nan kuma Annabi da umurnin Allah ya ɗebi tsakuwa da hannunsa mai daraja ya jefa a jihar kãfirai. Bãbu wanda ya rage a cikinsu, fãce tsakuwar nan tã shiga a cikin idãnunsa.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh yūḥī rabbuka ilā al-malāikati annī maʿakum fathabbitū alladhīna āmanū sa-ul'qī fī qulūbi alladhīna kafarū al-ruʿ'ba fa-iḍ'ribū fawqa al-aʿnāqi wa-iḍ'ribū min'hum kulla banānin
